Text: Works fine, but every text in the menu screen and main screen is white so it's hard to think what to press!? And it the game crosshair is white square and some other parts in the game...
Portlock, did you try right clicking the game's icon and setting the compatibility mode to an older version? That could help the graphics.
Works like a charm on my laptop Dell Core i3, thank so fuckin' much ;]

Everyone should be warned about this download:  This is NOT the original ms-dos atomic pack / atomic addon that was released in 1996.  This is some made-for-windows customized thing by some other group other than 3d realms.  If you're looking for the MS-DOS version, do not waste your time or bandwidth with this torrent.
